comment.author: 52583849@N04
comment._content: Nieuport 21 - note the smooth side of the Fuselage - this was a Nieuport 17 that was fitted with a lowered powered 80hp LeRhone instead of the 110hp version in the 17, given a new cowl and with the headrest omitted. The engine and cowl were very similar to those of the 11, hence the 11 and 21 are commonly confused, however this was a larger aircraft than the 11. Originally intended as a long range escort fighter, most of the 21's were used as trainers.
